table_caption: Discriminant analysis by different combinations of quantitative metrics
table_foot: Abbreviations: Daxial, axial diffusivity; Dradial, radial diffusivity; MD, mean diffusivity; FA, fractional anisotropy; Kaxial, axial kurtosis; Kradial, radial kurtosis; MK, mean kurtosis.a1,000 times of simple sampling from the biased‐corrected and accelerated percentile bootstrap after removal of the outliers, defined by those with absolute value of Z score >2.bThe classification accuracy of the Fazekas scale was derived by incorporating all components, including total score and scores of periventricular and deep white matter hyperintensities.cThe classification accuracies were derived by analyzing bilateral thalami and segregated thalamic regions, respectively.
